wikipedia_page.main: Lucy Shaw (born 17 July 1997) is a British professional racing cyclist, who last rode for UCI Women's Team Drops.

response: The Fluffers is the name of Tilbrook's band when Tilbrook performs without Squeeze. They tour internationally, and consist of Tilbrook, Stephen Large (keyboards), Simon Hanson (drums) and Lucy Shaw (electric bass).
